name: SmoothieKing
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smoothie king
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Smoothie King Reorder skill for Alexa, it’s easier than ever to reorder your most recent and favorite orders. Order with Alexa to skip the line and pick up your order or sit back while we deliver.
All you need to do is link your Smoothie King account and have a previous order that was placed online or in the Smoothie King app. Then, just say “Alexa, open Smoothie King” to Rule The Day®.

Features:
- Quickly reorder your recent smoothies
- Automatically earn Healthy Rewards points for every purchase
